text: Buenavista de Cañedo, officially Buenavista, is a town in the municipality of San Martín de Hidalgo in the state of Jalisco, Mexico. It has a population of 2,001 inhabitants.PueblosAmerica.com - Buenavista, San Martín Hidalgo, Jalisco ==References== ==External links== *Buenavista at PueblosAmerica.com Category:Populated places in Jalisco
title: Buenavista de Cañedo
